fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy

Class AbstractCyPhyComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.AbstractCyPhyComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, CyPhyComponentI

    public abstract class AbstractCyPhyComponent
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
implements CyPhyComponentI
    The class AbstractCyPhyComponent add the necessary properties and methods required to turn a standard BCM component into a cyber-physical one.

    Description

    Local simulation architectures in simulationArchitectures are plain architectures producing simulators that can run in isolation within the component.

    Local simulation architectures can also be part of global inter-component simulation architectures where they appear as atomic models (thanks to the closure of model composition in DEVS).

    Work in progress...

    White-box Invariant

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Black-box Invariant

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2019-06-18

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
